ygData.subject: We can't wear the black Neriak Robes  :(
ygData.msgSnippet: Gnomes may be the only race specific robes, but the black neriak robes are class specific, Necro only!  My room mate s necro, and I looked at his. Dang, huh!
ygData.messageBody:
Gnomes may be the only race specific robes, but the black neriak robes are
class specific, Necro only! My room mate's necro, and I looked at his.
Dang, huh! :(

Root - 29wiz...Bristlebane
